nl.esciencecenter.esight.text

Class MultiColorText

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.models.Model
      • nl.esciencecenter.esight.text.MultiColorText

  • public class MultiColorText
extends Model
    Multicolor-enabled text model. Relies _heavily_ on experimental and undocumented jogamp additions for font and graph rendering (which I do not fully understand).
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen
